titles.title: SF256 When I needed a neighbour

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I needed a neighbour, were you there, were you there?
When I needed a neighbour, were you there?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I was hungry and thirsty, were you there, were you there?
I was hungry and thirsty, were you there?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I was cold, I was naked, were you there, were you there?
I was cold, I was naked, were you there?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When I needed a shelter, were you there, were you there?
When I needed a shelter, were you there?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
When I needed a healer, were you there, were you there?
When I needed a healer, were you there?

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Wherever you travel, I'll be there, I'll be there
Wherever you travel, I'll be there

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And the creed and the colour and the name don't matter
Were you there?
